p: To further characterize these neutralizing antibodies, we sequenced the variable regions of all these mAbs. Three pairs of mAbs were found to share the same genes for the variable regions (6D2/9B10, 3E1/7B11, and 1H9/9A10) ( Table 2). Thus, we actually obtained 12 unique antibodies, among which 11 of them exert complement-dependent neutralizing activities.
